title: Artifact
description: Root schema for all OpenForm artifacts (containers and documents).

$schema.description: JSON Schema URI for this artifact instance.

name.description: Unique artifact identifier. Must start with a letter or digit, can contain letters, numbers, and hyphens (no leading/trailing/consecutive hyphens).

version.description: Artifact version (semantic versioning). Required for publishing to registry.

title.description: Human-readable title. Recommended for published/shared artifacts and directory browsing.

description.description: Detailed description or context for the artifact.
